item.title: Command or control enter in bootstrap forms
item.author: alberto@albertogrespan.com (Alberto Grespan)
item.description: Using command enter to submit: $(document).on('keydown', '.controls > .text, .controls > .string', function(event) { if(event.keyCode == 13 && (event.metaKey || event.ctrlKey)) { $('input.btn.submit-helper').click(); } }); Add a helper class to your submit button to identify it. If you want to target normal inputs use .text and to target textareas use .string or use both.
